div.p: Value indicating whether an activity is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record. From HL7 V3 Reference Information Model.

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Value indicating whether an activity is currently being acted upon, represents future intentions or is now a historical record. From HL7 V3 Reference Information Model.

display.value: An intervention to avoid, something NOT to do.

definition.value: An intervention to avoid, something NOT to do.

display.value: Suggested or possible intervention, not necessarily accepted by patient or provider.

definition.value: Suggested or possible intervention, not necessarily accepted by patient or provider.

display.value: A course of action that has been rejected.

definition.value: A course of action that has been rejected.

display.value: Accepted and pending, scheduled, or waiting to start

definition.value: Accepted and pending, scheduled, or waiting to start

display.value: Overridden or otherwise not executable, e.g., entered in error

definition.value: Overridden or otherwise not executable, e.g., entered in error
